title: Volume of incoming audio messages on whatsapp too low
content:
Every time I receive an audio message on whatsapp I have to increase the volume to 100% to hear anything. Even then, it's not nearly as loud as anything else (like music or a youtube video). 
It's incredibly frustrating to have to turn up and down the volume all the time depending on what app I'm using.
I upgraded from a pixel 3 and I did not have this issue there, so it's definitely something new with the pixel 5.
